name: Program-Ace
tagline: AR/VR, Games, Virtual Training and 3D Development
description:
Program-Ace is a successful, time-proven, and innovation-oriented IT company with more than 25 years’ experience. Since 1992, our team of experienced developers and artists have completed over 800 projects in different fields.
Program-Ace core services are:
Virtual reality development
Mixed and Augmented reality development
Cross-platform development
Mobile app development
Game development
2D art, 3D modeling, and animation
We have broad experience in creating various types of applications:
Virtual training and simulation
Interactive 3D solutions
Product configurators
Mobile applications
VR, AR, and mixed reality solutions
Our areas of key technical expertise:
Unity development
Xamarin
Unreal Engine
.NET
Java
Frontend web technologies (JavaScript, Angular.js, React.js)
Awards and recognition:
TOP 3 Virtual and Augmented Reality Developers 2017 (Clutch)
the Best of Global Outsourcing 100 companies 2018 (IAOP)
Unity Certified Developers
Top 1000 B2B Companies around the world
Top 15 Web & Software Developers of Ukraine 2015 (Clutch)
